</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.12.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;ERISA.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not, and shall not suffer or permit any of its ERISA Affiliates to:
(a)&nbsp;engage in a prohibited transaction or violation of the fiduciary responsibility rules with respect to any Plan which has resulted or could reasonably be expected to result in liability of
Lessee in an aggregate amount in excess of $5,000,000; or (b)&nbsp;engage in a transaction that could be subject to Section&nbsp;4069 or 4212(c) of ERISA.</FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.13.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Change in Business.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not, and shall not suffer or permit any Subsidiary of
Lessee to engage in any material line of business substantially different from those lines of business carried on by Lessee and its Subsidiaries on the date hereof.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.14.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Accounting Changes.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not, and shall not suffer or permit any Subsidiary of
Lessee to, make any significant change in accounting treatment or reporting practices, except for changes in accounting treatment or reporting practices (a)&nbsp;required by GAAP and (b)&nbsp;of
newly acquired businesses which are made to bring such businesses into conformity with Lessee's accounting treatment or reporting practices; Lessee shall not change the fiscal year of Lessee or of any
Subsidiary.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.15.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Negative Pledges, Restrictive Agreements, etc.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee will not, and will not permit any
of its Subsidiaries to, enter into any agreement (excluding this Agreement and any other Operative Document and the Credit Agreement) prohibiting:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;the
creation or assumption of any Lien upon its properties, revenues or assets, whether now owned or hereafter acquired, other than upon any properties or assets
subject to Liens described in</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Sections 8.2(i)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;(j)
&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and entered into as part of the financing secured by such Liens; or</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;the
ability of any Subsidiary of Lessee to make any payments, directly or indirectly, to Lessee by way of dividends, advances, repayments of loans or advances,
reimbursements of management and other intercompany charges, expenses and accruals or other returns on investments, or any other agreement or arrangement which restricts the ability of any such
Subsidiary to make any payment, directly or indirectly, to Lessee, except on the ability of any special purpose Subsidiary created solely to effect a sale of financial assets entered into as part of
such sale.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.16.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to Amend; Restrictive Agreements.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee will not, and will not permit any of its
Subsidiaries to, enter into, or accept obligations under, any agreement (a)&nbsp;prohibiting (including subjecting to any condition) the ability of Lessee, or any of its Subsidiaries to amend,
supplement or otherwise modify this Agreement or any other Operative Document or (b)&nbsp;containing any provision that would contravene any provision of this Agreement or any other Operative
Document.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.17.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Net Worth.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not permit at any time Net Worth to be less than the sum of
(a)&nbsp;600,607,200 (80% of Net Worth as of October&nbsp;31, 1997),</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;plus&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)&nbsp;for each fiscal year,
commencing with the fiscal year ending October&nbsp;31, 1998, 50% of positive net income for such fiscal year,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;plus
&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)&nbsp;with respect to the issuance or sale of capital stock of Lessee or the conversion of Indebtedness of Lessee into equity of Lessee, in each case
occurring after the date hereof, 50% of the aggregate Net Issuance Proceeds received by Lessee from such issuance or sale of capital stock plus 50% of the principal amount of any Indebtedness so
converted if such issuance, sale or conversion occurs at a time when Lessee shall have no Rating or at a time when Lessee's Rating is lower than BBB- and Baa3, respectively; such covenant
to be calculated as of the end of each fiscal quarter.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.18.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Funded Debt to EBITDA Ratio.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not permit, as of the end of any fiscal
quarter, the ratio of (a)&nbsp;the aggregate principal amount of funded Debt of Lessee and its Subsidiaries to (b)&nbsp;EBITDA for the four consecutive fiscal quarters then ending, to exceed
3.0:1.
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=48,EFW="9930982",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",FOLIO=43,FILE='DISK039:[99STP0.99STP3280]GI3280A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='30-DEC-1999;08:06' -->
</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
8.19.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;EBITDA to Interest Expense Ratio.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall not permit for any period consisting of
four consecutive fiscal quarters then ending the ratio of EBITDA for such period to Interest Expense for such period to be less than 4.0:1.</FONT></P>

<BR>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="gi3280_article_ix_other_covenants_and_agreements"> </A></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE IX<BR> OTHER COVENANTS AND AGREEMENTS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
9.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Covenants of the Participants and Agent Lessor.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>Lessor Liens</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Each of the Participants (severally and not jointly with any other Participants) and Agent Lessor,
hereby agrees that so long as this Participation Agreement is in effect it:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;will
not create, incur, assume or suffer to exist any Lessor Lien attributable to it upon the Lease or the Premises (other than as contemplated by any of the
Operative Documents); and</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;will
remove any Lessor Lien created or incurred by it and use its best efforts to remove any Lessor Lien attributable to it assumed or suffered to exist by it upon
the Lease or the Premises (other than such Liens as are contemplated by any of the Operative Documents);</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that any action taken
pursuant to this
&nbsp;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall not limit Lessee's rights or remedies under any of the Operative Documents.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>Depreciation</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Prior to the Expiration Date, neither Agent Lessor nor any Participant shall claim any federal or
state tax attributes or benefits (including depreciation) relating to the Premises unless required to do so by an appropriate taxing authority or after a clearly applicable change in Applicable Laws
or as a protective response to a proposed adjustment by a Governmental Authority;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that if an appropriate taxing authority shall
require Agent Lessor or any Participant to claim any such federal or state tax attributes or benefits,
such Person shall promptly notify Lessee thereof and shall permit Lessee to contest such requirement in a manner consistent with the contest rights and limitations provided in</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.5(b)</I></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>Release of Documents</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Agent Lessor hereby agrees that, upon a sale of the Premises pursuant to Article&nbsp;XXI of
the Lease and payment of all amounts due and owing from Lessee under the Operative Documents or repayment in full of all Certificates and all other amounts due and owing from Lessee under the
Operative Documents to Agent Lessor and the Participants, Agent Lessor shall execute and deliver to Lessee releases of all Liens created by the Operative Documents, and termination statements
for any financing statements relating to the Premises which are then of record naming Agent Lessor as secured party.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
9.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Withholding.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If Agent Lessor, any Participant or any assignee of, or
Sub-Participant in, any Certificate (each such assignee or Sub-Participant, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Transferee</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") is organized under the laws of any
jurisdiction other than the United States or any State thereof, then such Agent Lessor, Participant or Transferee, as applicable, shall (as a condition precedent to acquiring or participating in any
Certificate) (i)&nbsp;furnish to Agent Lessor, the agent under the Transfer Agreement and Lessee in duplicate, for each taxable year of such Participant or Transferee during the Lease Term, a
properly completed and executed copy of either Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;4224 or Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;1001 and Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;W-8 or
Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;W-9 and any additional form (or such other form or successor form) as is necessary to claim complete exemption from United States withholding taxes,
and (ii)&nbsp;provide to Agent Lessor, the agent under the Transfer Agreement and Lessee a new Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;4224 or Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;1001 and Internal
Revenue Service Form&nbsp;W-8 or Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;W-9 and any such additional form (or any successor form or forms) upon the expiration or obsolescence of
any previously delivered form and comparable statements in accordance with applicable

<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=49,EFW="9930982",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",FOLIO=44,FILE='DISK039:[99STP0.99STP3280]GI3280A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='30-DEC-1999;08:06' -->
United States laws and regulations and amendments duly executed and completed by such Participant or Transferee, and to comply from time to time with all applicable United States laws and regulations
with regard to such withholding tax exemption.</FONT></P>

<BR>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="gi3280_article_x_lessee_direct__gi302298"> </A></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE X<BR> LESSEE DIRECTIONS; REPLACEMENT OF PARTICIPANTS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
10.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee Directions.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Each of the Participants, Agent Lessor and Lessee hereby agree that,
so long as no Default or Event of Default exists:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Lessee
shall have the exclusive right to replace a Defaulting Committed Participant pursuant to</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10.2(b)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Lessee
shall have the right to replace any Participant with respect to which there are or would be any claim to reimbursement or compensation
under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.5</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Whenever
all or any portion of Basic Rent is calculated by reference to the LIBO Rate, Lessee shall have the right, by delivering a notice to the Administrative
Agent on or before 12:00 noon (New York, New York time) on a Business Day, to elect irrevocably, on not less than three nor more than five Business Days' notice prior to the last day of any then
current LIBO Rate Period, that all or any portion in an aggregate minimum amount of $5,000,000 and an integral multiple of $1,000,000 of the Certificate Amount of a Committed Participant be continued
as Basic Rent determined by reference to the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) having a LIBO Rate Period (subject to the limitations set forth in the definition thereof) of the length set forth in such
notice (in the absence of delivery of such notice at least three Business Days' before the last day of any then current LIBO Rate Period with respect thereto, the LIBO Rate Period shall be one month).</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
10.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Replacement of Participants.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Lessee
shall have the right to replace (i)&nbsp;any Committed Participant that breaches its obligation (if any) under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;3.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>to make an Advance or (ii)&nbsp;any Tranche A2 Participant, if
the short-term debt
ratings of such Tranche A2 Participant shall cease to be at least equal to the Required Ratings under the Transfer Agreement.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Subject
to the limitations set forth in</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10.1</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Lessee shall be permitted to replace
any Participant subject to replacement as described in</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10.2(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, with a replacement bank or other financial institution or
other Person (a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Replacement Participant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") satisfactory to Lessee and, in the case of a Committed Participant, satisfactory to Agent Lessor in its
reasonable discretion;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that (i)&nbsp;such replacement does not conflict with any Applicable Laws, (ii)&nbsp;the
Replacement Participant shall purchase from the Defaulting Committed Participant (A)&nbsp;at par, all Certificate Amounts, of such Defaulting Committed Participant, (B)&nbsp;all accrued Rent with
respect to such Certificate Amounts, and (C)&nbsp;all other amounts owing to such Defaulting Committed Participant on or prior to the date of replacement, in each case, (iii)&nbsp;Lessee shall be
liable to such Defaulting Committed Participant for any amounts owing under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>if any Certificate Amount
owing to such Defaulting Committed Participant shall be prepaid (or purchased), (iv)&nbsp;such replacement shall be made in accordance with the provisions of and shall be subject to the requirements
of</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;11.1</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, and if the Defaulting Committed Participant is a Purchaser, Section&nbsp;4.12 of the Transfer Agreement
(</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Lessee or the relevant Replacement Participant shall be obligated to pay the Transaction Expenses arising in connection therewith),
(v)&nbsp;the Replacement Participant shall have agreed in writing, addressed and delivered to each of the parties to this Participation Agreement, to be subject to all of the terms and conditions of
the applicable Operative Documents (including the extension of the Lease Term contemplated by the relevant request for extension), (vi)&nbsp;upon such replacement, the Defaulting Committed
Participant shall automatically be deemed to be released by Lessee and each remaining Participant from any
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=50,EFW="9930982",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",FOLIO=45,FILE='DISK039:[99STP0.99STP3280]GI3280A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='30-DEC-1999;08:06' -->
and all obligations thereafter arising under the Operative Documents and (vii)&nbsp;in the case of the replacement of a Tranche A2 Participant, such Replacement Participant shall be rated not less
than the Required Ratings under the Transfer Agreement.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Agent
Lessor and the Participant hereby agree to cooperate with Lessee, at Lessee's sole cost and expense, in Lessee's efforts to arrange one or more Replacement
Participants as contemplated by this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;10.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

<BR>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="gi3280_article_xi_transfers_of_participants__interests"> </A></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XI<BR> TRANSFERS OF PARTICIPANTS' INTERESTS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
11.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Assignments.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;All
or any part of the interest of any Participant in, to or under this Participation Agreement, the other Operative Documents, the Premises or the Certificates may
be assigned or transferred by such Participant at any time to any Person;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that (i)&nbsp;each assignment or transfer shall
comply with all applicable securities laws; (ii)&nbsp;each assignment or transfer shall consist of
a transfer of equivalent portions of such Participant's Certificates, and equivalent portions of such Participant's rights and obligations under this Participation Agreement and the Transfer Agreement
(if applicable to such Participant) and Commitments and Put Commitment (if applicable to such Participant); (iii)&nbsp;each assignment or transfer of Certificate Amounts shall be in a minimum
aggregate amount of $10,000,000 and $1,000,000 integral multiples in excess thereof (or, if less, the aggregate amount of Certificate Amounts then held by the assignor or transferor Participant),
unless such assignment or transfer is by a Tranche A Participant pursuant to the Transfer Agreement; (iv)&nbsp;in the case of an assignment other than to a Tranche A1 Participant, Tranche A2
Participant or Tranche A3 Participant, the assignee or transferee may not have a lower rating by S&amp;P or Moody's than the assignor or transferor; (v)&nbsp;in the case of an assignment by a Tranche A2
Participant, the transferee or assignee shall be a financial
institution acceptable to Agent Lessor, in its reasonable discretion; (vi)&nbsp;Agent Lessor shall have received from assignee/transferee or the assignor/transferor a transfer fee in the amount of
$2,500; (vii)&nbsp;so long as no Default has occurred, Lessee shall have consented to such assignment or transfer, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld and shall be deemed granted if
Lessee shall not have refused to grant such consent within ten (10)&nbsp;calendar days' notice of a proposed assignment or transfer; and (viii)&nbsp;each assignee or transferee shall
(A)&nbsp;acknowledge in writing, addressed and delivered to each of the parties to this Participation Agreement, that the obligations to be performed from and after the date of such transfer or
assignment under this Participation Agreement and all other Operative Documents are its obligations, including the obligations imposed by this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;11.1(a)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and the obligations imposed
by</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;9.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, and
except for an assignment from a Tranche A Participant to another Tranche A Participant under the Transfer Agreement, the transferor and transferee Participant shall deliver to Lessee and Agent Lessor
an Assignment Agreement, in substantially the form of</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Exhibit&nbsp;L&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and an Investor's Letter in substantially the
form of</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Schedule&nbsp;II&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>to</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Exhibit&nbsp;L</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, each
executed by the assignee or transferee) and (B)&nbsp;represent and warrant to Agent Lessor, each Participant and Lessee in writing each of the representations and warranties as set forth
in</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;7.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and that:</FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(w)&nbsp;it
has the requisite power and authority to accept such assignment or transfer;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(x)&nbsp;it
will not transfer any Certificate unless the proposed transferee makes the foregoing representations and covenants;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(y)&nbsp;it
will not take any action with respect to such Certificate that would violate any applicable securities laws; and</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=51,EFW="9930982",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",FOLIO=46,FILE='DISK039:[99STP0.99STP3280]GI3280A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='30-DEC-1999;08:06' -->
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(z)&nbsp;it will not assign or transfer any interest in its Certificate except in compliance with this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;11.1</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Any
transfer or assignment made in violation of the above requirements shall not be effective against the other parties to this Participation Agreement until such requirements are satisfied.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
11.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Participations.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Participant may at any time sell to one or more commercial banks or
other Persons (each of such commercial banks and other Persons being herein called a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Sub-Participant</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") participating interests in all or a
portion (but not less than $1,000,000) of its rights and obligations under this Participation Agreement, the other Operative Documents, or its Certificates (including, without limitation, all or
portion of the Rent owing to it);</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;no
participation contemplated in this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;11.2&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall relieve such
Participant from its obligations hereunder or under any other Operative Document;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;such
Participant shall remain solely responsible for the performance of its Commitment and such other obligations;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Lessee
shall continue to deal solely and directly with such Participant in connection with such Participant's rights and obligations under this Participation
Agreement and each of the other Operative Documents;</FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;each
such Sub-Participant will make representations and warranties to the Participant that are consistent with</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;7.1</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;mutatis mutandis</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>;
and</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;no
Sub-Participant, unless such Sub-Participant is an Affiliate of such Participant, or is itself a Participant, shall be entitled to
require such Participant to take or refrain from taking any action hereunder or under any other Operative Document.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding
the foregoing provisions of this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;11.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, any sale, transfer or participation from any
Tranche A1 Participant to any Purchaser pursuant to the Transfer Agreement shall not be subject to the provisions of</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Sections 11.1
&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;11.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, but instead the provisions of the Transfer Agreement shall be applicable.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
11.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Binding Effect; Disclosure of Information; Pledge Under Regulation&nbsp;A.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;By
its acceptance of a participation or assignment of a Participant's Certificate, each Transferee shall be deemed bound by the provisions set forth in
this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XI</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;Any
Participant or Agent Lessor may, in connection with any assignment or participation or proposed assignment or participation pursuant to
this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XI</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, disclose to the assignee or Participant or proposed assignee or Participant any information relating to Lessee.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Anything
in this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XI&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>to the contrary notwithstanding, any Participant
may, without the consent of Lessee, assign and pledge all or any portion of the Certificates held by it to any Federal Reserve Bank, the United States Treasury or to any other financial institution as
collateral security pursuant to Regulation&nbsp;A of the F.R.S. Board and any operating circular issued by the Federal Reserve System and/or the Federal Reserve Bank or otherwise.</FONT></P>

<BR>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="gi3280_article_xii_indemnification"> </A></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ARTICLE XII<BR> INDEMNIFICATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
12.1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Indemnification.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;General Indemnification.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;

<!-- ZEQ.=7,SEQ=52,EFW="9930982",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",FOLIO=47,FILE='DISK039:[99STP0.99STP3280]GI3280B.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='30-DEC-1999;08:06' -->
</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Prior
to the Base Term Commencement Date and without limitation on the rights of any Indemnitee under any other indemnification set forth in
this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall pay and assume liability for, and does hereby agree, whether or not any of the transactions contemplated hereby shall be consummated, to indemnify,
protect, defend, save and keep harmless Agent Lessor from and against any and all Claims that may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against Agent Lessor (whether because of action or omission by
Agent Lessor), whether or not such Claim is covered by any other indemnification under this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or Agent
Lessor shall also be indemnified as to any such Claim by any other Person whenever such Claim arises or accrues, including whether or not such Claim arises or accrues at any time prior to or after the
Expiration Date, and which in all cases include any Claim for which Agent Lessor has an obligation to indemnify any Person, or for which Agent Lessor otherwise has liability, under
Section&nbsp;12.1(a)(i)(B) below, and</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;Agent
Lessor shall pay and assume liability for, and does hereby agree to indemnify, protect, defend, save and keep harmless each Construction Period Participant
Indemnitee from and against any and all Claims that my be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against any such Construction Period Participant Indemnitee (whether because of action or omission by such
Construction Period Participant Indemnitee), whether or not such Claim is covered by any other indemnification under this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>vArticle&nbsp;XII
&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or such Construction Period Participant Indemnitee shall also be indemnified as to any such Claim by any other Person, and</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;Commencing
upon the Base Term Commencement Date, and without limitation on the rights of any Indemnitee under any other indemnification set forth in
this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, whether or not any of the transactions contemplated hereby shall be consummated, Lessee shall pay and assume
liability for, and does hereby agree to indemnify, protect, defend, save and keep harmless each Indemnitee from and against any and all Claims that may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against
such Indemnitee (whether because of action or omission by such Indemnitee), whether or not such Claim is covered by any other indemnification under this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or such Indemnitee
shall also be indemnified as to any such Claim by any other Person, whenever such Claim arises or accrues,
including whether or not such Claim arises or accrues at any time prior to or after the Expiration Date, and whether or not such Claim arises or accrues at any time prior to or after the Expiration
Date,</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>in
each case under this Section&nbsp;12.1 (a)(i)&nbsp;or (ii), in any way arising out of or relating to:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A.&nbsp;&nbsp;any
of the Operative Documents or any of the transactions contemplated thereby or any investigation, litigation or proceeding in connection therewith, and any
amendment, modification or waiver in respect thereof;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;B.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
Premises, the Land or any part thereof or interest therein;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;C.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
purchase, mortgaging, design, construction, preparation, installation, inspection, delivery, non-delivery, acceptance, rejection, purchase,
ownership, possession, rental, lease, sublease, repossession, maintenance, repair, alteration, modification, addition or substitution, storage, transfer or title, redelivery, use, financing,
refinancing, operation, condition, sale (including, without limitation, any sale or other transfer pursuant to the Lease), return or other disposition of all or any part of any interest in the
Premises, the Land or the imposition of any Lien (or incurring of any liability to refund or pay over any amount as a result of any Lien) thereon, including, without limitation: (i)&nbsp;Claims or
penalties arising from any violation of law or in tort (strict liability or otherwise), (ii)&nbsp;loss of or damage to the environment (including, without limitation, investigation costs, cleanup
costs, response costs, remediation

and removal costs, costs of corrective action, costs of financial assurance, and all other damages, costs, fees and expenses, fines and penalties, including natural resource damages), or death or
injury to any Person, and all expenses associated with the protection of wildlife, aquatic species, vegetation, flora and fauna, and any mitigative action required by or under any Environmental Laws,
(iii)&nbsp;any Claim resulting from or related to latent or other defects, whether or not discoverable, (iv)&nbsp;any Claims resulting from the existence or Release of any Hazardous Substance at
or from the Premises, (v)&nbsp;any Claim resulting from or related to the acquisition of the Land or the Construction, (vi)&nbsp;any Claim based upon a violation or alleged violation of the terms
of any restriction, easement, condition or covenant or other matter affecting title to the Premises, (vii)&nbsp;the making of any Modifications in violation of any standards imposed by any insurance
policies required to be maintained by Lessee pursuant to the Lease which are in effect at any time with respect to the Premises or any part thereof, (viii)&nbsp;any Claim for patent, trademark or
copyright infringement, or (ix)&nbsp;Claims arising from any public improvements with respect to the Premises resulting in any change or special assessments being levied against the Premises or any
plans to widen, modify or realign any street or highway adjacent to the Premises, or any Claim for utility "tap-in" fees;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;D.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
offer, issuance, sale, transfer or delivery of the Certificates;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;E.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
breach or alleged breach by Lessee, including in its role as Construction Agent, of any covenant, representation or warranty made by it or deemed made by it in
any Operative Document, any Construction Document or any certificate delivered by it;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;F.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
transactions contemplated hereby or by any other Operative Document, in respect of the application of Parts 4 and 5 of Subtitle B of Title I of ERISA and any
prohibited transaction described in Section&nbsp;4975(c) of the Code;</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;G.&nbsp;&nbsp;the
retaining or employment of any broker, finder or financial advisor by Lessee to act on its behalf in connection with this Participation Agreement; or</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;H.&nbsp;&nbsp;any
other agreement entered into or assumed by Lessee in connection with the Premises or the Land or by Agent Lessor in the purchase of the Land (including, in
connection with each of the matters described in this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>to which this indemnity shall apply, matters
based on or arising from the negligence of any Indemnitee).</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>It
is expressly understood and agreed that the indemnity provided for herein shall survive the expiration or termination of and shall be separate and independent from any remedy under the Lease or any
other Operative Document.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
12.2.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Environmental Indemnity.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;Without limitation of the other provisions of
this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Article&nbsp;XII</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Lessee hereby agrees to indemnify, hold harmless and defend each Indemnitee from and against any and all
Claims, losses, damages, liabilities, fines, penalties, charges, administrative and judicial proceedings (including informal proceedings) and orders, judgments, remedial action, requirements,
enforcement actions of any kind, and all reasonable and documented costs and expenses incurred in connection therewith (including reasonable and documented attorneys' and/or paralegals' fees and
expenses), including all costs incurred in connection with any investigation or monitoring of the condition of the Premises or any clean-up, remedial, removal or restoration work by any
Governmental
Authority (all of the foregoing being referred to in this</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.2&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>as "Liabilities"), arising in whole or in
part, out of:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;the
presence on, under or around the Premises or any portion thereof of any Hazardous Substance, or any releases or discharges of any Hazardous Substance on, under,
from, onto or around the Premises or any portion thereof,</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;any
activity, including, without limitation, construction (including construction of the Financed Improvements), carried on or undertaken on or off the Premises or
any portion thereof, and whether by Lessee or any of its Affiliates or any predecessor in title or any employees, agents, sublessees, contractors or subcontractors of Lessee, any of its Affiliates or
any predecessor in title, or any other Persons (including such Indemnitee), in connection with the handling, treatment, removal, storage, decontamination, clean-up, transport or disposal
of any Hazardous Substance that at any time is located or present on, under or around, or that at any time migrates, flows, percolates, diffuses or in any way moves onto or under the Premises or any
portion thereof,</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;loss
of or damage to any property or the environment arising from, or in any way related to, the Premises or Lessee or any of its Affiliates (including, without
limitation, clean-up costs, response costs, remediation and removal costs, cost of corrective action, costs of financial assurance, fines and penalties and natural resource damages), or
death or injury to any Person, and all expenses associated with the protection of wildlife, aquatic species, vegetation, flora and fauna, and any mitigative action required by or under Environmental
Laws, in each case arising from, or in any way related to, the Premises, Lessee, any of its Affiliates or the Overall Transaction or any portion thereof,</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;any
claim concerning lack of compliance with Environmental Laws, or any act or omission causing an environmental condition that requires remediation or would allow
any Governmental Authority to record a Lien against the Premises or any portion thereof, or</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;any
residual contamination on or under any part of the Premises, or affecting any natural resources, and any contamination of any property or natural resources
arising in connection with the generation, use, handling, storage, transport or disposal of any such Hazardous Substance, in each case arising from, or in any way related to, the Premises, Lessee, any
of its Affiliates, or the Overall Transaction or any portion thereof, and irrespective of whether any of such activities were or will be undertaken in accordance with Applicable Laws.</FONT></P>

<H2><FONT SIZE=3 > </FONT></H2>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Notwithstanding
anything in this Participation Agreement to the contrary, Lessee shall not be liable and shall not be obligated to indemnify any Indemnitee against Liabilities arising out of:</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Environmental
Violations on the Premises after title and exclusive possession of the Premises shall have been conveyed to Agent Lessor to the extent arising solely
from Hazardous Substances placed on the Premises after the transfer of such title and exclusive possession to Agent Lessor; and or</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;the
willful misconduct by an Indemnitee, its officers, directors, employees, agents, contractors or representatives.</FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Promptly
upon obtaining knowledge thereof, Indemnitees shall give written notice to Lessee of any claim against Indemnitees, which might give rise to a claim by Indemnitees against
Lessee under the foregoing indemnity, stating the nature and basis of the claim, the amount thereof and reasonable best estimate of the amount of Lessee's liability to Indemnitees in connection
therewith, provided there shall be no liability to any Indemnitee and no diminution in the obligations of Lessee for failure to give such notice. If any action shall be brought against Indemnitees,
Lessee shall be entitled to participate therein, and to assume the defense thereof at the expense of Lessee with counsel reasonably satisfactory to Indemnitees and to settle and compromise any such
claim or action with the consent of such Indemnitees in their sole discretion;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that Indemnitees may elect to be represented by
separate counsel, at Lessee's expense, if such Indemnitee believes in good faith that a conflict of
interest may exist.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
12.3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Premises Indemnity.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;If (a)&nbsp;Lessee elects the Sale Option; and (b)&nbsp;after
paying to Lessor, for the benefit of the Participants, any amounts due under Articles XX and XXI of the Lease, the Lease Balance shall not have been reduced to zero, then Lessee shall promptly pay
over to Agent Lessor on the Expiration Date the shortfall, unless Lessee delivers a report from an appraiser selected by the Required Participants in form and substance satisfactory to the Required
Participants and using approved methods satisfactory to the Required Participants which establishes that the reasons for the actual Fair Market Value of the Premises as of the Expiration Date being
less than the Fair Market Value anticipated for such date in the Appraisal was not due to any of the following events, circumstances or conditions, whether or not permitted under the Lease:
(i)&nbsp;the failure to maintain the Premises as required by the Lease and the other Operative Documents, and in at least as good a condition as it was in on the Completion Date, ordinary wear and
tear excepted; (ii)&nbsp;the carrying out of or the failure to undertake any modifications, improvements or Modifications (including the Financed Improvements) whether or not permitted pursuant to
the Operative Documents; (iii)&nbsp;any change or modification to the Approved Plans and Specifications following the earlier of (x)&nbsp;the Document Closing Date and (y)&nbsp;the delivery of
the Approved Plans and Specifications pursuant to</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;6.1(p</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>), whether or not permitted pursuant to the Operative Documents,
(iv)&nbsp;the existence of any environmental condition at or affecting the Premises, whether or not such condition existed on the initial Advance Date; (v)&nbsp;any defect, exception, easement,
restriction or other encumbrance on or title to the Premises, whether or not created or existing on the initial Advance Date; (vi)&nbsp;the dependence of the Premises on any improvement or facility
not fully located on the Premises (except for government-provided utilities existing and benefitting the Premises as of the date hereof, the benefits of which are lost for reasons other than the fault
of Lessee and which could not have been retained through the exercise by Lessee of commercially reasonable efforts to keep such utilities in place); (vii)&nbsp;any restoration or rebuilding carried
out by Lessee or any sublessee; (viii)&nbsp;any condemnation of any portion of the Premises pursuant to Article&nbsp;XV of the Lease; (ix)&nbsp;any use of the Premises or any part thereof by
Lessee or any sublessee other than as an office building; or (x)&nbsp;any other cause or condition within the power of Lessee to control or affect, other than ordinary wear and tear.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
12.4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;Proceedings in Respect of Claims.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;With respect to any amount that Lessee is requested by
an Indemnitee to pay by reason of</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1(a)&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such Indemnitee shall, if so

requested by Lessee and prior to any payment, submit such additional information to Lessee as Lessee may reasonably request and which is in the possession of such Indemnitee to substantiate properly
the requested payment.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
case any action, suit or proceeding shall be brought against any Indemnitee, such Indemnitee shall notify Lessee of the commencement thereof, and Lessee shall be entitled, at its
expense, to participate in, and, to the extent that Lessee desires to, assume and control the defense thereof through its own counsel, which shall be subject to the reasonable approval of the Required
Participants, on behalf of the Indemnitee;</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;however</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that
Lessee shall have acknowledged in writing its obligation to fully indemnify such Indemnitee in respect of such action, suit or proceeding, and, Lessee shall keep such Indemnitee fully apprised of the
status of such action, suit or proceeding and shall provide such Indemnitee with all information with respect to such action, suit or proceeding as such Indemnitee shall reasonably request. Lessee
must indicate its election to assume such defense by written notice to the Indemnitee within 90&nbsp;days following receipt of Indemnitee's notice of the Claim, or in the case of a third party claim
which requires a shorter time for response then within such shorter period as specified in the Indemnitee's notice of Claim,</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;provided
&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>that such Indemnitee has given Lessee notice thereof. Lessee shall not be entitled to assume and control the defense of any such action, suit or proceeding if
and to the extent that, (A)&nbsp;in the reasonable opinion of such Indemnitee, (x)&nbsp;such action, suit or proceeding involves any risk of imposition of criminal liability or any material risk
of imposition of material civil liability on such Indemnitee or will involve a material risk of the sale, forfeiture or loss of, or the creation of any Lien (other than a Permitted Lien) on the
Premises or any part thereof unless, in the case of civil liability, Lessee shall have posted a bond or other security reasonably satisfactory to the relevant Indemnitees in respect to such risk or
(y)&nbsp;the control of such action, suit or proceeding would involve an actual or potential conflict of interest, (B)&nbsp;such proceeding involves Claims not fully indemnified by Lessee which
Lessee and the Indemnitee have been unable to sever from the indemnified Claim(s), or (C)&nbsp;an Event of Default has occurred and is continuing. The Indemnitee may participate in a reasonable
manner at its own expense and with its own counsel in any proceeding conducted by Lessee in accordance with the foregoing. Lessee shall not enter into any settlement or other compromise with respect
to any Claim which is entitled to be indemnified under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as applicable, without the prior written consent of the
Indemnitee, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed in the case of a money
settlement not involving an admission of liability of such Indemnitee.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
Indemnitee shall supply Lessee with such information and documents reasonably requested by Lessee as are necessary or advisable for Lessee to participate in any action, suit or
proceeding to the extent permitted by</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as applicable, and Lessee shall reimburse the Indemnitee for the reasonable
out-of-pocket expenses of supplying such information
and documents. Unless an Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, no Indemnitee shall enter into any settlement or other compromise with respect to any Claim which is entitled to be
indemnified under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as
applicable, without the prior written consent of Lessee, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, unless such Indemnitee waives its right to be indemnified under</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as applicable, with respect to such Claim, does not
admit any criminal liability or civil liability on behalf of Lessee in connection with such Claim, and uses reasonable efforts to advise Lessee on the status of proceedings from time to time during
the pendency of such Claim.</FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon
payment in full of any Claim by Lessee pursuant to</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;Section&nbsp;12.1&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>or</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;12.2</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as applicable, to or on behalf of an Indemnitee, Lessee,
without any further action, shall be subrogated to any and all claims that such Indemnitee may
have relating thereto (other than claims in respect of insurance policies
maintained by such Indemnitee at its own expense), and such Indemnitee shall execute such instruments of assignment and conveyance, evidence of claims and payment and such other documents, instruments
and agreements as may be necessary to preserve any such claims and otherwise cooperate

with Lessee and give such further assurances as are necessary or advisable to enable Lessee vigorously to pursue such claims.</FONT></P>
